titleStmt.title: Proposals to the King and Parliament how this tax of one hundred sixty thousand pounds per moneth, may be raised, by a monethly tax for one year, without any charge to any particular person, and with great advantage to the whole nation : this may be done by setting up banks here, like the banks at Venice / by M. Lewis ...
titleStmt.author: Lewis, M. (Mark), fl. 1678.
